item.title: Thanks to the @its_arrhythmia duo for creating a superb Supersonic special - it'll get you all excited for next weekend!
item.dc:creator: @supersonicfest

item.title:
For Supersonic 2022 we move to an exciting new home on the outer edges of Digbeth, Birmingham. The post-industrial landscape of our midlands home is forever changing, so we've outlined the most up-to-date methods of joining us over on our website:
http://bit.ly/SS22_Gettinghere
item.dc:creator: @supersonicfest
item.description:
For Supersonic 2022 we move to an exciting new home on the outer edges of Digbeth, Birmingham. The post-industrial landscape of our midlands home is forever changing, so we've outlined the most up-to-date methods of joining us over on our website:

bit.ly/SS22_Gettinghere

item.title:
On the Saturday of Supersonic 2022 we'll be hearing from author @spinal_bap about his book Electric Wizards, out on @reaktionbooks . It explores the rich tapestry of Heavy Music from 1968 right through Supersonic darlings @Pigsx7
http://bit.ly/SS22_JRMoores
item.dc:creator: @supersonicfest
item.description:
On the Saturday of Supersonic 2022 we'll be hearing from author @spinal_bap about his book Electric Wizards, out on @reaktionbooks . It explores the rich tapestry of Heavy Music from 1968 right through Supersonic darlings @Pigsx7

item.title: R to @MidWorldMo: See you there - CJ will have merch too!!!

item.title: This friday we'll be welcome CJ from Black Lodge Press as our special guest DJ at the Print Matters launch party - expect radgey punk, queer electro and filthy pop bangers! Come down to Centrala from 6pm this @digbethfirstfri - http://bit.ly/SS_printmatters
item.dc:creator: @supersonicfest
item.description:
This friday we'll be welcome CJ from Black Lodge Press as our special guest DJ at the Print Matters launch party - expect radgey punk, queer electro and filthy pop bangers!
Come down to Centrala from 6pm this @digbethfirstfri - bit.ly/SS_printmatters

item.title: R to @supersonicfest: and here's the extra-fun happenings going on at @Centrala_space, against the backdrop of our Print Matters exhibition...

item.title:

item.title:
Fresh from Glasto and a show with @peaches, @theyisgrove is joining us for the Friday night of Supersonic 2022 - anyone else ‚Äòexcited to just be sweaty with everyone again‚Äô ?
https://supersonicfestival.com/2022/06/28/grove-promises-queer-sovereignty-drum-and-bass-beats/

item.title:
RT by @supersonicfest: üéâ @supersonicfest is back 8-10 July in Digbeth üéâ
And this year includes a film programme üìΩÔ∏è
Including 16mm manipulations from filmmaker Erin Weisgerber and a selection of 'Heavy Shorts' from director John Bradburn.
Check out the full line-up: https://supersonicfestival.com/line-up/
item.dc:creator: @flatpack
item.description:

item.title: Our food court is this year is stocked with tacos, tempeh, dumplings and fried chicken from Masa, @beet_system, @blowwaterco and @boneheadbham. @purityale and @AwesomeCoffee will be keeping the drinks flowing and our much-loved tea room will be back too! https://supersonicfestival.com/2022/06/27/food-and-drink-at-supersonic-2022/
item.dc:creator: @supersonicfest
item.description:
Our food court is this year is stocked with tacos, tempeh, dumplings and fried chicken from Masa, @beet_system, @blowwaterco and @boneheadbham. @purityale and @AwesomeCoffee will be keeping the drinks flowing and our much-loved tea room will be back too!
supersonicfestival.com/2022/‚Ä¶

item.title:

Tune in here: https://bit.ly/SS22_playlist

item.title:
With @eyehatethou joining us on their first European jaunt since the before times, Andy Gibbs spoke to with Lore about working with @EmmaRuthRundle and Mizmor, scoring @roboticgeo's game Norco, and getting back on the road following a broken knee.
https://lorezine.com/2022/06/22/the-long-road-a-conversation-with-andy-gibbs-of-thou/
item.dc:creator: @supersonicfest
item.description:
With @eyehatethou joining us on their first European jaunt since the before times, Andy Gibbs spoke to with Lore about working with @EmmaRuthRundle and Mizmor, scoring @roboticgeo's game Norco, and getting back on the road following a broken knee.

lorezine.com/2022/06/22/the-‚Ä¶

item.title:
All weekend at Supersonic 2022, @theQuietus will be taking over the rooftop bar at @TheMillBham. Expect DJ sets from @ukaeatech, Noel Gardener, @Miss_chance and @JenniferLAllan @JahDuran and @spinal_bap
Find The Quietus' guide to Supersonic 2022 here: http://thequietus.com/articles/31654-supersonic-2022
item.dc:creator: @supersonicfest
item.description:
All weekend at Supersonic 2022, @theQuietus will be taking over the rooftop bar at @TheMillBham. Expect DJ sets from @ukaeatech, Noel Gardener, @Miss_chance and @JenniferLAllan @JahDuran and @spinal_bap

Find The Quietus' guide to Supersonic 2022 here:
thequietus.com/articles/3165‚Ä¶

item.title:
Joining us at our exhibition Print Matters and over in the Supersonic Marketplace, @dogsectionpress is a not-for-profit distributor of seditious literature, and a worker-owned coop.
Come on down to @Centrala_space this @digbethfirstfri to see more:
http://bit.ly/SS_printmatters
item.dc:creator: @supersonicfest
item.description:
Joining us at our exhibition Print Matters and over in the Supersonic Marketplace, @dogsectionpress is a not-for-profit distributor of seditious literature, and a worker-owned coop.

Come on down to @Centrala_space this @digbethfirstfri to see more:

bit.ly/SS_printmatters

item.title:
With Supersonic 2022 fast approaching, we've been reminiscing about the last time we were all together. Who caught Daniel Higgs in 2019? While he's not performing this year, he's been working on something very special for us. More on that very soon...
http://youtube.com/watch?v=kURIBiaLO3g
item.dc:creator: @supersonicfest
item.description:
With Supersonic 2022 fast approaching, we've been reminiscing about the last time we were all together. Who caught Daniel Higgs in 2019? While he's not performing this year, he's been working on something very special for us. More on that very soon...

invidious.fdn.fr/watch?v=kURIBiaL‚Ä¶

item.title:
We're very excited to welcome Portland psych six-piece @abroniaband to the supersonic stage on Friday 8th July. Their latest release ‚ÄòMap of Dawn‚Äô begs to be heard live.
https://supersonicfestival.com/2022/06/26/portlands-abronia-bring-map-of-dawn-to-europe/
item.dc:creator: @supersonicfest
item.description:

item.title:
Downstairs from our Print Matters exhibition, local artist @josephfrascina will be hosting a collage workshop on 10th July at @Centrala_space - drop in and get cutting and sticking.
http://bit.ly/SS_cutthatout
item.dc:creator: @supersonicfest
item.description:

item.title:
